## Week 6 Structural Equivilence 


```{r}
g_mat <- as.matrix(get.adjacency(simplify(ig)))
g_eq <- equiv.clust(g_mat, mode = "graph", glabels = rownames(g_mat), plabels = rownames(g_mat))
plot(g_eq)
as.data.frame(rownames(g_mat))
```




```{r}
g_block <- blockmodel(g_mat, g_eq, h=30, mode="graph")
plot(g_block, cex=0.1)
```

```{r}
g_block
```

```{r}
gplot(g_mat, vertex.col = g_block$block.membership, gmode="graph")
```
